Building sustainable futures through community-driven development

Who We Are

BOZCH Africa Limited is a non-profit organization founded in 2025 in Malawi by Nelson Blackson and Omega Zambasa. We are dedicated to empowering rural communities through sustainable development initiatives that address critical challenges in water access, education, healthcare, and agriculture.

Our work is rooted in the belief that every community has the potential to thrive when given the right tools, resources, and support. We partner with local communities to co-create solutions that are sustainable, culturally appropriate, and impactful.

Our Vision

A Malawi where every rural community thrives with access to clean water, quality education, sustainable livelihoods, and environmental stewardship.

Our Mission

To empower rural communities in Malawi through sustainable development initiatives that foster self-reliance, improve quality of life, and preserve environmental resources for future generations.

|

These principles guide everything we do

Integrity

We operate with transparency, honesty, and accountability in all our actions.

Community First

We prioritize community needs and ensure local voices guide our initiatives.

Sustainability

We design programs for long-term impact and environmental responsibility.

Collaboration

We work together with partners, communities, and stakeholders to achieve shared goals.

Innovation

We embrace creative solutions to address complex development challenges.
